channel.title: Help! Protecting and Increasing Magic Attack Damage
channel.description:
I have an InsidiaX base (Idk if it's an official base, known by everyone, but I have reason to believe that it's just been upgraded from a Hybrid PvP base)
Anyhoo.
I really need help on how to stop Magic attacks (from Corporeal Beast etc.) from hitting on players so hard (what bonus do I change etc? >.<)
Also, how do I make Magic casted from players (Staff of Light with Ancient Magics for example) hit higher?
PLEASE will someone help me this time, I'm not getting a good feeling about these forums, no one seems to be answering my problems :s
Idznak

item.title: Help! Protecting and Increasing Magic Attack Damage
item.dc:creator: @Idznak Idznak
item.description:
@Idznak wrote:

Daginith:

All of that should just be in a file called ‘CombatAssistant.java’ i think.

I’ve found some lines of code with notes explaining that they are melee, range, and magic damage, but I don’t know what I would do to make them hit higher. Any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Help! Protecting and Increasing Magic Attack Damage
